title: Maori village: a concert rehearsal near Rotarua
brief_description: Shows life in a typical Maori village; various customs of the Maoris; washing clothes in the hot pools; children at play; traditional costumes; concert party rehearse songs and dances; thermal activity; geysers and boiling springs.
